title: Enhancing Medical Practical Skills: Intergenerational Mathematics Learning Strategy Design Using Augmented Reality (AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Comprehension of Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: They can design three or more intergenerational interaction learning activities using AR technology.
Ability to explain the application of PISEC’s seven learning design principles to AR exhibition development

Learners will design one prototype visualizing core concepts in healthcare/nursing (e.g., blood circulation, medication routes) for small groups (3–5 members) within a week, gather at least three specific feedbacks from peers/mentors, and submit an improvement plan.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
